summary:
SHARPE: Housecarls

Housecarls will switch between regular clothing and combat gear when going into and out of the player's house in their respective home towns. In addition, housecarls will wear a sleeping outfit when going to bed in that home.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Highly Advanced (or Hopefully Acceptable ;)) Role Playing Enhancements presents:

SHARPE: Housecarls

Housecarls will switch between regular clothing and combat gear when going into and out of the player's house in their respective home towns. In addition, housecarls will wear a sleeping outfit when going to bed in that home. For example, Lydia will wear fine clothing while inside Breezehome, but her armor everywhere else.

Details:
The switching of outfits only occurs when a housecarl is actively entering or leaving the house, it will not affect the housecarl's current outfit when loaded.
The housecarl will switch outfits regardless of whether or not he/she is following the player.
The switching of outfits does not affect the housecarl's inventory.

Also available from the Steam Workshop [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9628]here[/url]
author: Herko ter Horst
